Organize an educational program for visitors to learn about the importance of conservation and responsible tourism in the national park.
Collaborate with local communities to develop sustainable tourism practices and promote eco-tourism.
Implement a wildlife monitoring system to track the population and behavior of endangered species in the park.
Create a mobile app that provides visitors with real-time information on park trails, weather, and wildlife sightings.
Host a community clean-up event to promote environmental stewardship and reduce litter in the park.
